articles.title: This soft serve machine is not broken, says NASA, shares image taken from ISS on Instagram - HT Tech

articles.content: NASA recently shared a breathtaking image of Earth taken from the International Space Station (ISS), revealing an incredible sight of frozen seawater. Captured on February 3, 2024, the image showcase… [+2253 chars]
